product.name: Unlocked.me
product.shortDescription: Perfect for busy students, through free digital banking, this account gives you quick and easy access to cash.

productAttributes.attributeName: Client FAIS Record of Advice|nedbank-commercial-release/FAISRecordOfAdviceStaffAssisted|ARRANGEMENT|APPLICATIONS|APPLICATIONSCREDITFACILITY|FAIS Client Acknowledgement

features.name: My Pocket
features.shortDescription: Saving facility on a current account

features.name: Digital banking allows you to purchase prepaid electricity and LOTTO tickets
features.shortDescription: Digital banking allows you to purchase prepaid electricity and LOTTO tickets

features.name: Airtime without Airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime using *130*005)
features.shortDescription: Airtime without Airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime using *130*005)

features.name: Send-iMali (send money to a cellphone number by dailing *120*001#)
features.shortDescription: Send-iMali (send money to a cellphone number by dailing *120*001#)

features.name: eNotes
features.shortDescription: Keep track of your finances with the eNotes SMS notifications, anytime, anywhere. eNotes keeps you informed about all transactions on your account.

features.name: No Funds Alert
features.shortDescription: Electronic notifications when you have insufficient funds for an attempted debit order.

features.name: Amex Card
features.shortDescription: Accelerate your Greenbacks rewards with the Amex Card

features.name: Affinity Programmes
features.shortDescription: At no cost to you, through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.

features.name: Debit Order Switching
features.shortDescription: Debit Order Switching with transactional product
